info.name: service_account_email
info.description: The email of the service account that was setup.

info.name: p12_file_name
info.description: The name of the p12 file that was added to the handler/resources directory.

info.name: impersonated_username
info.description: The username of the user you want to impersonate when making the call.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
